judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
Miscellaneous Petition No.118 of 1971
Laxmibai Narayan Sayana & ors.
... Petitioners
v/s.
Harishchandra Narayan Sayana & ors.
... Respondents
None present for parties.
----
CORAM : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD, J.
DATED :
st July, 2009
P.C.:
.This is an old Petition of 1971. The Applicants  
Advocate Mr.Manoj Dalvi is not present. Having regard 
to the interests of justice, it would be appropriate if 
the office is directed to issue notice to the Advocate 
requesting him to inform the Court as to whether 
anything survives in these proceedings and whether the 
Applicants are interested in still pursuing them, 
failing which the Court would take necessary steps in 
accordance with law by passing appropriate orders in 
the Petition.
.Notice shall be returnable on 22
nd July 2009.
(DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD, J.)
